forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High near 15C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 59F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Thunder possible. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Thunder possible. Low around 50F. SSW winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers likely along with a possible rumble of thunder in the morning, then partly cloudy late. High 13C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms in the morning. Partly cloudy skies late. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 8C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 45F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny. High around 15C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 57F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 8C. NNW winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low near 45F. NNW winds at 10 to 20 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. NE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 63F. NE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low 49F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High near 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High around 60F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 16C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High near 60F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later at night. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 16C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 60F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning with bright sunshine in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 17C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 62F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.
